channel.title: Saskatchewan Blockchain Association
channel.description: Recent content on Saskatchewan Blockchain Association

item.title: Burgers & Bitcoin - Eat on Wheels
item.description: Join us for this informative evening session and learn how to invest into Bitcoin with special guest Benjamin Perrin, host of the BTC sessions! Entire burger menu will be discounted at 20% for the duration of the event!

item.title: Introducing the Saskatchewan Blockchain Association
item.description: Sask Blockchain is a new Blockchain Association for the Province of Saskatchewan. Our goal is to promote the use of Blockchain technology.

item.title: About
item.description: Saskatchewan Blockchain Association Inc. is a not-for-profit membership corporation offically established November, 2019.

item.title: Association Membership
item.description: Our monthly meetups are always free. Further support our community by becoming a member. 2020 Membership for individuals is $10 Membership benefits: Discounts to any future ticketed events “Membership card” issued as Ethereum NFT Vote at Annual General Meeting Join Now

item.title: Blockchain & Beers March 2020
item.description: Our casual monthly meetup. Come out and chat with other local Bitcoin and Blockchain enthusiasts.

item.title: Join
item.description: Join us on social media and say hi Facebook Slack Twitter Individual Memberships Become a member to support our community. Individual membership for 2020 are $10 and you discounts on any future ticketed events. Corporate Memberships Please contact us for more information.
